history.text: Hello
Hey!  Have you got a chance to see The Avengers yet?
No I have not
Should I?
You should check it out.  I know you're a fan of Robert Downey Jr.  He's in it and so is Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans, and Chris Hemsworth.
Joss Whedon directed it and it gets pretty good reviews.
I am also a Robert Downey fan, so he is playing iron man again?
He is.  And Hemsworth is Thor, Ruffalo is Hulk and Evans is Captain America again.  They are even bringing Scarlett Johansson back as Natasha/Black Widow!
Seems like a great cast. Is there any other heros in the movie?
Hawkeye comes into play as does Nick Fury!    The villain is Loki which is pretty darn cool.
Critics really liked Mark Ruffalo as Hulk.
Isn't Loki one of their families?
Yeah, he is Thor's brother.  He wants to subjugate earth after a wormhole opens and he shows up.  Agent Coulson from S.H.E.I.L.D. makes a cameo.
I really like that they were able to bring all of these characters together. Does it seem to fit well together?

Yeah, definitely, I read one reviewer saying that Whedon stirs all the personalities and ingredients together and makes the avengers new and 'irresistibly tasty again.'  I thought that was a great way of talking about it!!
It's a funny movie as much as it is exciting!
Lots of moments of humor between Ironman and the other characters.
Yes that really does make my interest rise. Glad they could make a comedy mix well with action
Totally. I mean it falls into the drama, superhero genre but it is so much more.
Good movies always seem to spread into many genres

Absolutely.  At one point the Avengers become divided over how to approach Loki and the fact that SHEILD wants to develop weapons to use against aliens.  It takes the death of an agent to pull them together to fight as a team
It's a good message of working towards the greater good.
Great to have an emotional work into the movie
All the fight scenes with Hulk are pretty amazing.  They did a good job with Banner's transformation.
Did the movie get good ratings online?
Rotten Tomatoes gave it a 92%.  So I'd say so!
It averaged about 8/10!
That is really good ratings. Did it come out last year?
In 2012.  They've made other films in the franchise since then but this is one of the best.
It does not seem like it came out 6 years ago. Would you say it has held up well over time?
I would definitely say that!  The scenes in New York look really recent and you would never know it was close to 6 years ago!!
I did not know it was based in NY. Is it all set in that area?
Mostly.  There are some scenes in Asgard and in space as well as some unidentified locations.  But it is mostly in New York.  Lots of stuff happens right in Manhattan!!
That is really cool. Hasn't other Avengers movies came out since?
Yep!  I think there has been another one or two.  You should check them out as well!
Sounds good I check it out

uid2response.feedback: They really made the movie seem very interesting.
